about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey with your friends around the world in an eco-friendly adventure made specifically for a group of 2 to 4 people. (Play together online through Remote Play). You will play as 8 mutated animals: duck, owl, squirrel and hedgehog, and others. After the apocalypse due to global warming, the characters realized that in order to survive, they would have to gather in a team and sort and recycle garbage.

Features:
  • Co-op only: play with friends from 1 device, or go on an exciting adventure through Remote Play.
  • Trash-Zombies: You waiting for the revived garbage? And he came. Due to mutations, the garbage came to life and destroys all the sorting stations around the world. to protect against it, you have turrets, and on each hero a flamethrower.
  • Survival: at the levels, to protect against zombies, there are barricades that are destructible. There is also an electricity generator, and an oxygen filter, which has its own hp.
  • Garbage sorting: the first computer game on the market about cooperative sorting garbage, you have to live the unusual day of an unusual sorter. You will recycle paper, plastic, and other garbage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630 or Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4600 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
